plays.text: Penalty to Eric Boulton 2 minutes for Roughing Jonas Hoglund

Goal scored by Vyacheslav Kozlov assisted by Jason Woolley and Alexei Zhitnik
Penalty to Rhett Warrener 2 minutes for Holding Alexander Mogilny

Penalty to Robert Reichel 2 minutes for Hooking DMITRI KALININ
